query:
SELECT
                m.channel_id,
                ch.name AS channel_name, -- Added the channel name here
                m.user_id,
                m.msg_text,
                m.ts,
                m.thread_ts,
                m.parent_user_id,
                u.id,
                u.name,
                u.real_name,
                u.display_name,
                u.image_url,
                u.email,
                u.deleted,
                u.is_bot,
                c.cnt
            FROM
                messages AS m
            INNER JOIN users AS u ON u.id = m.user_id
            INNER JOIN channels AS ch ON ch.id = m.channel_id -- Joined the channels table
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*) as cnt,
                    thread_ts as join_ts,
                    parent_user_id
                FROM
                    messages
                WHERE
                    channel_id = $1
                GROUP BY
                    join_ts,
                    parent_user_id
            ) AS c ON m.ts = c.join_ts AND m.user_id = c.parent_user_id
            WHERE
                m.channel_id = $1 AND m.parent_user_id = ''
            ORDER BY
                m.ts DESC
            LIMIT $2
